text:
Chiropractic
The diagnosis and treatment of mechanical disorders of the musculoskeletal system, especially the spine.
[more](services.cfm?lang=1)
With more than 23 years of practice, I treat patients with satisfactory results in relief of headaches and migraines, back pain and herniated discs, tied together with a physiotherapeutic approach which guarantees the efficacy of the technique backed by scientific evidence in diagnosis and treatment.
Chiropractic uses the Spinology (Spinology: disinfied full spine adjustment) which is the most correct, painless and safe way.
The goal of a Spinologist is to always keep the body as free from spinal occlusions as possible, independently of how they feel and move.
The diagnosis and treatment of mechanical disorders of the musculoskeletal system, especially the spine.
A procedure in which blood is taken from a patient's circulation to have a process applied to it before it is returned to the circulation.
Manual readjustments, myofascial release and other physical manipulation of muscle tissue and bones.
Therapy is used to improve a patient's quality of life through examination, diagnosis, prognosis, and physical intervention.
